text: Ej farzandoni Odam, hamono ʙaroi sumo liʙose firistodem, to sarmgohatonro ʙipusad va in liʙos zaruri ast va niz liʙosi zinnatro, ki in liʙosi kamoli ne'mat ast. Va liʙosi parhezgori, ki in ʙa co ovardani amrhoi Alloh va dur ʙudan az man'kardahoi Ust va on ʙehtarin liʙos ast ʙaroi mu'min. Va in jake az ojoti Alloh ast, ʙosad, ki pand girand
